channel.title: ArmithscapePK is recruiting!
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xA0Q8.jpg[/img]
ARMITHSCAPE:
Armithscape is designed as a PK server from ground up, we orginally got hold of Xellscape (Thanks to Apocalypsepk) and modified it alot and fixed bugs, we have customs like Vesta, statius and Zuriels, and are working to find a server hoster and fix bugs at the moment. Our server is for PKing, but also all the skills work, so its possible to run a great economy, i will also be adding the Mini-G.E
FEATURES: Great and flawless PKing (With pk points) Working minigames Good shops Fully working skills Skillcapes Good staff Decent economy Dueling-with stakes!
WHO WE WANT: We want mature people over the age of 13, and people who can be serious about working as a team.
At this moment in time, we are looking for:
Server hoster:
Webdesigner:
Advertiser/Videomaker:
If you are interested post here with these examples:
Server Hoster: Why you are interested: Your age: Can you host 24/7?:
Webdesigner: Why you are interested: Your age: What can you do?:
Advertiser/Videomaker: Why are you interested:? Your age: What can you do?:
Add me on my msn: kieron532@live.com Or just PM me if interested.
Thanks for reading!
